name: Ryans Computers BD more productive web layout
description:
This is a style that fits my need while browsing through their website.
I tried to use most of my screen space.
Changes:
1. Reduced the size of landing page carousal (good zoom level on hover) [I found it very annoying]
2. Reduced the product card size in product listing 
3. Moved the pagination to the upper portion of the screen for better quick navigation
4. Removed their article on product list page
5. Removed the EMI information from product card
6. some other minor tweaks.
